Package ohos.nfc.tag

Class MifareClassicTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.tag.TagManager
      • ohos.nfc.tag.MifareClassicTag

  • public class MifareClassicTag
extends TagManager
    Provides interfaces to create MifareClassic tags and obtain the tag information.

    This class inherits from TagManager and provides interfaces to create MifareClassic tags and obtain the block and sector information of the MifareClassic tags.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Communication#NFC

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BLOCK_BYTES
      Indicates the size of each block of the MifareClassic tag in bytes.
      static int MIFARE_CLASSIC
      Indicates the Mifare classic tag.
      static int MIFARE_PLUS
      Indicates the Mifare Plus tag.
      static int MIFARE_PRO
      Indicates the Mifare Pro tag.
      static int MIFARE_UNKNOWN
      Indicates the Mifare tag of an unknown type.
      static int TAG_ROM_1K
      Indicates a MifareClassic tag with 16 sectors, each having 4 blocks.
      static int TAG_ROM_2K
      Indicates a MifareClassic tag with 32 sectors, each having 4 blocks.
      static int TAG_ROM_4K
      Indicates a MifareClassic tag with 40 sectors, with the first 32 sectors each having 4 blocks and the remaining 8 sectors each having 16 blocks.
      static int TAG_ROM_MINI
      Indicates a MifareClassic tag with 5 sectors, each having 4 blocks.
      static byte USE_KEY_A
      Indicates the Mifare authentication key of type A.
      static byte USE_KEY_B
      Indicates the Mifare authentication key of type B.

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.nfc.tag.TagManager

        ISO_DEP, MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT, NDEF, NFC_A, NFC_B, NFC_F, NFC_V

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MifareClassicTag getInstance​(TagInfo tagInfo)
        Obtains a MifareClassic tag based on the given tag information.

        During tag reading, if the tag supports the NFC-A technology, a MifareClassic object will be created based on the given tag information.

        Parameters:
        tagInfo - Indicates the given tag information.
        Returns:
        Returns the MifareClassic tag.
        Since:
        3

      • getMifareType

        public int getMifareType​()
        Obtains the Mifare type of this MifareClassic tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the Mifare type of this MifareClassic tag, such as MIFARE_CLASSIC and MIFARE_PLUS.
        Since:
        3

      • getTagSize

        public int getTagSize​()
        Obtains the size of this MifareClassic tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the size of this MifareClassic tag, such as TAG_ROM_1K and TAG_ROM_2K.
        Since:
        3

      • getSectorsNum

        public int getSectorsNum​()
        Obtains the number of sectors of this MifareClassic tag base on the size of tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of sectors of this MifareClassic tag. For example, a MifareClassic tag that is TAG_ROM_1K in size has 16 sectors.
        Since:
        3

      • getBlocksNum

        public int getBlocksNum​()
        Obtains the number of blocks of this MifareClassic tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of blocks of this MifareClassic tag.
        Since:
        3

      • getBlocksNumForSector

        public int getBlocksNumForSector​(int sectorId)
        Obtains the number of blocks in a specified sector of this MifareClassic tag.
        Parameters:
        sectorId - Indicates the ID of the specified sector.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of blocks in the specified sector of this MifareClassic tag.
        Since:
        3

      • getSectorId

        public int getSectorId​(int blockId)
        Obtains the sector ID of a Mifare Classic tag based on the block ID of the Mifare tag.
        Parameters:
        blockId - Indicates the block ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the sector ID.
        Since:
        3

      • getFirstBlockId

        public int getFirstBlockId​(int sectorId)
        Obtains the ID of the first block of a MifareClassic tag in a specified sector.
        Parameters:
        sectorId - Indicates the ID of the specified sector.
        Returns:
        Returns the ID of the first block in the specified sector.
        Since:
        3

      • authenSectorUseKey

        public boolean authenSectorUseKey​(int sectorId,
                                  byte[] key,
                                  byte keyType)
        Authenticates a specified sector of this MifareClassic tag with a key.
        Parameters:
        sectorId - Indicates the ID of the specified sector.
        key - Indicates the key in bit array format.
        keyType - Indicates the key type, such as USE_KEY_A and USE_KEY_B.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the authentication succeeds; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • readBlock

        public byte[] readBlock​(int blockId)
        Reads content of a specified block of this MifareClassic tag based on the block id.
        Parameters:
        blockId - Indicates the ID of the block to read.
        Returns:
        Returns the specified block content of this MifareClassic tag.
        Since:
        3

      • writeBlock

        public void writeBlock​(int blockId,
                       byte[] data)
        Writes data to a specified block of this MifareClassic tag.
        Parameters:
        blockId - Indicates the ID of the specified block to which the data will be written.
        data - Indicates the data to write to the specified block.
        Since:
        3

      • incBlock

        public void incBlock​(int blockId,
                     int value)
        Adds a value to the content of a specified block of this MifareClassic tag.
        Parameters:
        blockId - Indicates the ID of block to increment.
        value - Indicates the non-negative value to increment.
        Since:
        3

      • decBlock

        public void decBlock​(int blockId,
                     int value)
        Deducts a value from the content of a specified block of this MifareClassic tag.
        Parameters:
        blockId - Indicates the ID of block to decrement.
        value - Indicates the non-negative value to decrement.
        Since:
        3

      • restoreBlock

        public void restoreBlock​(int blockId)
        Migrates the content of a specified block of this MifareClassic tag to an internal buffer.
        Parameters:
        blockId - Indicates the ID of the specified value block.
        Since:
        3
